body.name: Gentle Glide Tampons with Triple Layer Protection, Regular, Unscented - 40 Count (Pack of 1)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 17 hrs 19 mins
features: With Simply Gentle Glide you can have the best of both worlds – it’s simple and a great value! Have peace of mind with the perfect fit for your unique flow. Packaging May Vary
360° Protection - Shapes to your body for a protective barrier against leaks.
Purified Fibers - Washed up to 5 times and weaved together to form an absorbent core.
Comfort Shape Plastic Applicator - Comfort shape applicator free from colors, dyes and BPA.
Available in 20 and 40 counts: scented or unscented
body.description: Product Description Playtex Simply Gentle Glide Tampons. Simple. Gentle. Reliable. Every ingredient used in Playtex Simply Gentle Glide is rigorously evaluated to provide reliable protection that you can trust to be gentle and safe for your body.* With purified fibers washed up to five times** and a comfort shape applicator that’s free from colors, dyes and BPA, you can feel good about choosing Simply Gentle Glide! *When used as instructed. **Purified fibers washed up to 5 times and weaved together to form an absorbent core Brand Story By Playtex From the Manufacturer Unique 360-degree design conforms to your shape. View larger.360° TRIPLE PROTECTION Our 360 Protection tampon has been designed with three layers, and shapes to your body for a fabulous fit. 3-layer design for a protective barrier against leaks Comfort shape plastic applicator for sure fit placement. DuraClean wrapper is purse resistant for protection on the go. Great Fit, Great Protection.What's in the Box Playtex Gentle Glide 360° Tampons, Unscented, Regular (40 count).Playtex Gentle Glide 360° Unscented TamponsRegular 40 ct.Super 36 ct.Super Plus 36 ct.Ultra 36 ct.Multipack 36 ct.Multipack Super/Super Plus 36 ct.Multipack Slender 50 ct.Playtex Personal Cleansing ClothsTub DispenserSinglesRefill PackTravel PackTampons are associated with Toxic Shock Syndrome (TSS). TSS is a rare but serious disease that may cause death. Please consult the product insert for further information. WARNING SIGNS OF TSS ARE, FOR EXAMPLE, SUDDEN FEVER (USUALLY 102° F OR MORE), VOMITING, DIARRHEA, FAINTING OR NEAR FAINTING WHEN STANDING UP, DIZZINESS, OR A RASH THAT LOOKS LIKE A SUNBURN. IF THESE SIGNS OR OTHER SIGNS OF TSS APPEAR, YOU SHOULD REMOVE THE TAMPON AT ONCE, DISCONTINUE USE, AND SEE YOUR DOCTOR IMMEDIATELY. IMPORTANT FACTS ABOUT TSS:There is risk of TSS to all women using tampons during their menstrual period. TSS is a rare but serious disease that may cause death. There are scientific studies that have concluded that tampons contribute to the cause of TSS. The reported risks are higher to women under 30 years of age and teenage girls. The incidence of TSS is estimated to be between 1 and 17 cases of TSS per 100,000 menstruating women and girls per year. REDUCING YOUR RISK OF TSS:You can reduce the risk of developing TSS during your period by alternating tampons with feminine pads. You can avoid any possible risk of getting tampon-associated TSS by not using tampons. There are scientific studies which have concluded that higher absorbency tampons increase the risk of TSS. You should select the minimum absorbency needed to control your flow to reduce the risk of developing TSS. Tampons are available in a range of absorbencies: Regular Absorbency (6-9 grams), Super Absorbency (9-12 grams) and Super Plus Absorbency (12-15 grams). Each absorbency range represents the grams of fluid that can be absorbed by all manufacturers' tampons based on a standardized laboratory test. Use this information to compare the absorbency of these tampons to other brands. If you have had warning signs of TSS in the past, you should check with your doctor before using tampons again. Consult your doctor if you have any questions about tampon use and TSS. See more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best set I ever used
reviews.reviewText: 100 % cotton works better for sensitive skin or any issues down there. Very affordable as well. Wonderful shape, very comfortable as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best tampons, imho.
reviews.reviewText: These are my favorite tampons. However, it's almost impossible to find a box of only the regular sized ones in stores. Most come with a combination of regular and super. The larger size tampons hurt me, so the only size I use is regular. This is the first time I've been able to find a box where all the tampons are regular, and therefore usable to me. These are comfortable and absorb well. Probably not good for women who have really heavy periods, but for women who have lighter ones, or want something comfortable to wear on their lighter days, I'd recommend these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I got for someone else. They like this product line very much

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Go to Brand
reviews.reviewText: It is hard to find this particular brand and style in retail stores lately. Luckily, I was able to find through Amazon. Gentle Glideis my go to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best tampons out there
reviews.reviewText: Only place I can find them is here and one other store. They are the best and don’t hurt my stomach like tampax.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Do I hate that these have plastic applicators, YES. But sometimes you cave on necessary things
reviews.reviewText: Such a great price considering that feminine products are taxed, and when you live downtown, that comes with a hefty price tag. Do I wish they were not plastic applicator? Yes. But when you are pretty broke and payday doesn't coincide with that time of the month... You invest in a value pack and you are set for 3 months. And that's a nice feeling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favourite tampon so far

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best tampons ever
reviews.reviewText: I love these. They seem to be the only tampons that open properly and have zero leakage. They are comfortable and have no added dye plus the price is right. Will continue to order. I had no problems with how they arrived.
Wish they were on subscribe and save. My fave tampon. Comfortable and works great.
I only purchase these from Amazon because I never see them in stores anymore. Love the comfort!
They work the way they should and not crappy like the cheaper brands.

I like these tampons. They are better than Tampax cardboard. I wish that the wrappers were more luxurious though, and I don't really like the design on the box. These usually give me a good four hours though, without any issues.
